Toegevoegd door Footballtricksonline laatste juli
Website: http://www.footballtricksonline.com FB: https://www.facebook.com/footballtricksonlineofficial Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/guidofto do you want to learn how to football? here you have a demonstration on how to do the "around the world" football/soccer trick to improve your football-soccer skills. Step 1 : Push the soccer ball with the inner part of your foot Step 2: Do a fake football/soccer move , swing your leg around the football to do it. Step 3 : Strike to the opposite way with a fast sprint! I hope this helps you in your football/soccer training. Try to improve your tricks and skills as much as you can. All these soccer moves are perfect as football training exercices. Watch the next football skills online tutorials to keep improving your soccer skills and have fun ;) Now you can do the popular tricks like football players like Cristiano ronaldo, neymar, messi, robinho, ronaldinho, carlitos tevez, etc The advanced step over can be used in futsal, street soccer, freestyle ,Street soccer anywhere! it´s an awsome football trick and not hard to learn ! learn this soccer skill now! football panna fotbalové triky サッカートリック 足球技巧 เทคนิคฟุตบอล футбольные трюки

snippet.title: Pop up Callejero - Soccer Tricks

Pop up Callejero - Soccer Tricks
Toegevoegd door Footballtricksonline laatste juli
Website: http://www.footballtricksonline.com FB: https://www.facebook.com/footballtricksonlineofficial Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/guidofto aquí tienes una demostración de cómo hacer EL "Pop up Callejero" un truco de futbol famoso para mejorar sus habilidades de futbolista. El truco de fútbol paso a paso : Paso 1 coloca el balón entre los dos pies.con tu pie dominante rueda el balón hacia arriba por tu pierna opuesta Paso 2 Rápidamente gira tu pie de apoyo completamente hacia atras y controla el balón Vean los siguientes vídeos tutoriales para seguir mejorando sus habilidades de fútbol y divertirse;) Espero que esto le ayude en su fútbol / entrenamiento de futbol. Trate de mejorar sus trucos y habilidades de futbol tanto como sea posible. Todos estos movimientos del fútbol son perfectos como ejercicios de entrenamiento de fútbol. Ahora usted puede hacer los trucos más populares como los jugadores de fútbol como Cristiano Ronaldo, Neymar, Messi, Robinho, Ronaldinho, Tevez carlitos, etc

snippet.title: How to kick like Cristiano Ronaldo cr7 - Soccer Tricks
snippet.description:
How to kick like Cristiano Ronaldo cr7 - Soccer Tricks
Toegevoegd door Footballtricksonline laatste juli
Website: http://www.footballtricksonline.com FB: https://www.facebook.com/footballtricksonlineofficial Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/guidofto do you want to learn how to football? here you have a demonstration on how to kick/shoot like cristiano ronaldo CR7, this soccer tutorial will help you to improve your football-soccer skills. step 1 Place the ball on the ground with the valve facing your foot step 2 take a distance of about 3-7 steps depending on the comfort of each person and the distance at which the goal is. step 3 Hit the ball with the area between the inner and the instep. (Do not hit full instep) try kicking strong or the effect will not work Now you can do the popular trick like football players like Cristiano ronaldo, neymar, messi,etc. Very famous football trick,mostly used in freestyle and also used to improve football/soccer skills and strengthen the thighs of football players

snippet.title: Ronaldinho Karaoke - Soccer Tricks
snippet.description:
Ronaldinho Karaoke - Soccer Tricks
Toegevoegd door Footballtricksonline laatste juli
Website: http://www.footballtricksonline.com FB: https://www.facebook.com/footballtricksonlineofficial Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/guidofto do you want to learn how to football? here you have a demonstration on how to implement an awesome soccer technique! EXPLANATION STEP 1-roll the ball with your dominant foot STEP 2-stop the ball with the sole of your non-dominant foot (the ball should stop right next to your other foot) STEP 3- drag the ball back with your sole and then flick it up with your toes STEP 4- finally control the ball learn these soccer/football tips and tricks to get better Now you can do the popular trick like football players like Cristiano ronaldo, neymar, messi,etc. fotbalové triky サッカートリック 足球技巧 เทคนิคฟุตบอล футбольные трюки Very famous football trick,mostly used in freestyle and also used to improve football/soccer skills and strengthen the thighs of football players

snippet.title: Street hook - Soccer Tricks
snippet.description:
Street hook - Soccer Tricks
Toegevoegd door Footballtricksonline laatste juli
Website: http://www.footballtricksonline.com FB: https://www.facebook.com/footballtricksonlineofficial Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/guidofto do you want to learn how to football? here you have a demonstration on how to do the soccer "street soccer hook" football/soccer trick to improve your football-soccer skills on the streets or not! step 1 Place the ball between your feet, then press it against your non dominant ankle, now roll the ball up, when you get to your calves height, roll it behind the calf until you reach the outer side of the calf. step 2 now roll the ball upwards with power and finally control it. Now you can do the popular trick like football players like Cristiano ronaldo, neymar, messi,etc. Very famous football trick,mostly used in freestyle and also used to improve football/soccer skills and strengthen the thighs of football players

snippet.title: Knee akka - Soccer Tricks
snippet.description:
Knee akka - Soccer Tricks
Toegevoegd door Footballtricksonline laatste juli
Website: http://www.footballtricksonline.com FB: https://www.facebook.com/footballtricksonlineofficial Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/guidofto do you want to learn how to football? here you have a demonstration on how to do the soccer "knee akka" football/soccer trick to improve your football-soccer skills. Explanation Control the ball. when you are ready,kick the ball upwards and hit it with the side of your knee to the outside, then quickly kick the ball back in with your foot Tip Try to hit the soccer ball with the side of your knee and softly, if you do it rough the ball will be far from your control area. Now you can do the popular trick like football players like Cristiano ronaldo, neymar, messi,etc. Very famous football trick,mostly used in freestyle and also used to improve football/soccer skills and strengthen the thighs of football players fotbalové triky サッカートリック 足球技巧 เทคนิคฟุตบอล футбольные трюки
